reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11753 FCA Cambodia Country Office (CAMCO)#2. Project area and Country: Cambodia#3. Project justification: #FCA Cambodia country programme (CP) will continue to focus on access to inclusive quality education, the right to develop, secure and sus tain livelihoods through employment, entrepreneurship and strengthened resilience, and the participation of the local communities, including the youth, in different structures to raise their voices and play an active role in their own development. FCAs fie ld presence is essential for increased impact and enhanced programme quality. It is in line with FCAs strategy and supports FCAs strategic goals related to programme development and quality, capacity building, advocacy, thematic/technical support, monitori ng and diversification of the funding base.#4. The main objective and expected results:#The objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of FCAs Cambodia country programme through established field presence. #The expected results are: # Strate gic and operational planning including programme and project PME and administrative support # Established a functional working relationship and collaboration with UN agencies, I/NGOs, CBOs and government authorities at country level # New partnership and n etworking opportunities have been created to broadening the funding opportunities # Effective coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations # Capacity of local partners are built for effective and efficient programme implementation # T hematic advice is provided to the country programme and projects # Effective emergency response/humanitarian aid has been provided during disasters # Resourcing and staffing of the Country Office have been ensured# Management and administration of the Coun try Office have been further strengthened # Input of partner organisations and topics from the country into the lobby and advocacy work have been increased# Support and input for communication purposes have been ensured#5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: The staff and partners of CAMCO Country Office#6. Implementing partner: FCA Cambodia Country Office

1. Project: 11753 FCA Cambodia Country Office (CAMCO)#2. Project area and Country: Cambodia#3. Project justification: #FCA Cambodia country programme (CP) will continue to focus on access to inclusive quality education, the right to develop, secure and sus tain livelihoods through employment, entrepreneurship and strengthened resilience, and the participation of the local communities, including the youth, in different structures to raise their voices and play an active role in their own development. FCAs fie ld presence is essential for increased impact and enhanced programme quality. It is in line with FCAs strategy and supports FCAs strategic goals related to programme development and quality, capacity building, advocacy, thematic/technical support, monitori ng and diversification of the funding base.#4. The main objective and expected results:#The objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of FCAs Cambodia country programme through established field presence. #The expected results are: # Strate gic and operational planning including programme and project PME and administrative support # Established a functional working relationship and collaboration with UN agencies, I/NGOs, CBOs and government authorities at country level # New partnership and n etworking opportunities have been created to broadening the funding opportunities # Effective coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations # Capacity of local partners are built for effective and efficient programme implementation # T hematic advice is provided to the country programme and projects # Effective emergency response/humanitarian aid has been provided during disasters # Resourcing and staffing of the Country Office have been ensured# Management and administration of the Coun try Office have been further strengthened # Input of partner organisations and topics from the country into the lobby and advocacy work have been increased# Support and input for communication purposes have been ensured#5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: The staff and partners of CAMCO Country Office#6. Implementing partner: FCA Cambodia Country Office
